info.title: Adaa Integrated Platform (AIP) Backend API
info.description: The Adaa Integrated Platform Backend API provides data warehouse access to the middleware layer of the Adaa National Platform. AIP is the core operations platform that Adaa use for reporting entities performance. AIP allows Adaa to manage strategies, objectives, KPIs and initiatives assigned to entities and monitor their progress on monthly and quarterly basis.

servers.description: Base Path for Testing Purposes Only

get.summary: Summary view of the objectives related to a specific strategy
get.description: Return status summary of all the objectives related to a specific strategy and a specific entity

parameters.name: strategy-id
parameters.description: the unique identification id of the strategy

parameters.name: entity-id
parameters.description: the unique identification id of the entity

200.description: return successfully the status summary of all the objectives related to a specific strategy and a specific entity

cd.description: the unique code of the KPI, its format is - Entity code.Objective number.KPI number

id.description: the unique ID for the KPI

statusHexColor.description: the status hex color approved by the organization

currentMeasurementYear.description: the year for which the score for the KPI is included

currentMeasurementQtr.description: the quarter for which the score for the KPI is included

previousMeasurementYear.description: the year for which the previous value of the KPI is used for calculating the difference change as reflected in the KPI Trend value

previousMeasurementQtr.description: the quarter for which the previous value of the KPI is used for calculating the difference change as reflected in the KPI Trend value

currentNormalizedScore.description: the KPI score normalized, its format is a number between 0 and 100

previousNormalizedScore.description: the previous KPI normalized score for calculating the difference change as reflected in the KPI Trend value

kpiTrend.description: lookup ID for KPI trend is a direction (Up is better or Down is worse) that is based on a comparison between an actual value and a target value difference of current period and previous period. Taken into consideration, data availability and KPI polarity

indicatorPerformance.description: Detailed information about the performance of an indicator

indicatorStatus.description: A sorted list of KPI status (from green to dark gray) and the number of indicators that belong to that status category

initiativeStatus.description: A sorted list of initiative status (from green to dark gray) and the number of initiatives that belong to that status category

numOfObjectives.description: the total number of objectives under the selected strategy for the entity

objectives.description: the list of all the objectives under the selected strategy for the entity

objectiveCD.description: the unique code of the Objective (Entity code.Objective number)

objectiveID.description: the unique ID for the Objective

strategyID.description: the unique ID for the strategy

indicators.description: list of all the indicators associated with the objective along with their summary performance

initiatives.description: list of all the initiatives associated with the objective along with their summary performance

strategyID.description: the unique ID for the strategy

numOfIndicators.description: the total number of indicators related to the specific strategy and the specific entity

indicatorPerformance.description: the list of all the indicators and their performance summaries

indicatorID.description: the unique identification id of the indicator

indicatorCode.description: the unique code of the indicator

numOfInitiatives.description: the total number of initiatives related to the specific strategy and the specific entity

numOfMilestones.description: the total number of milestones related to the specific strategy and the specific entity

numOfOutputs.description: the total number of outputs related to the specific strategy and the specific entity

initiativeID.description: the unique ID for the Initiative

initiativeCD.description: the unique Code for the initiative, its format - visoin code (1 digits) - program code (2 digits) - entity code (3 digits) - unique ID for the initiative (4 digits)

budgetStatus.description: the budget status of the Initiative

normalizedScore.description: the normalized score for the Initiative

actualStartDate.description: the actual date to start the Initiative

plannedEndDate.description: the planned date to finish the Initiative

milestonesList.description: the list of  milestones related to the Initiative

numOfIndicators.description: the total number of common indicators related to the specific entity

indicatorPerformance.description: the list of all the common indicators and their performance summaries

indicatorID.description: the unique identification id of the indicator

indicatorCode.description: the unique code of the indicator

objectiveName.description: the name of the objective the indicator belongs to

strategyName.description: the name of the strategy the indicator belongs to

strategyID.description: the unique identification id of the strategy

normalizedScore.description: the KPI score normalized, its format is a number between 0 and 100

statusHexColor.description: the status hex color approved by the organization

initiativeID.description: the unique identification id of the initiative

initiativeCode.description: the unique code of the initiative

objectiveName.description: the name of the objective the initiative belongs to

strategyName.description: the name of the strategy the initiative belongs to

strategyID.description: the unique identification id of the strategy

normalizedScore.description: the initiative score normalized, its format is a number between 0 and 100

statusHexColor.description: the status hex color approved by the organization
the status hex color approved by the organization

numOfIndicators.description: the number of indicators that belong to the status

indicatorStatus_inner.description: Each item in the list of KPI status that includes - the status name, status hex color code and the number of indicators that belong to that status

status.description: the status title which is the percentage behind the planned achievement of milestones

statusHexColor.description: the status hex color approved by the organization

numOfInitiatives.description: the number of initiatives that belong to the status

initiativeStatus_inner.description: Each item in the list of initiative status that includes - the status name, status hex color code and the number of initiatives that belong to that status

id.description: the unique ID for the Objective

code.description: the unique code of the Objective (Entity code.Objective number)

numOfInitiatives.description: the number of initiaitves under the Objective

numOfIndcators.description: the number of indicators under the Objective

changes.description: the change in the indicator from the previous value

cd.description: the unique code for the initiative, its format is - vison code (1 digits) - program code (2 digits) - entity code (3 digits) - unique ID for the initiative (4 digits)

id.description: the unique ID for the initiative

statusHexColor.description: the status hex color approved by the organization

status.description: the status title which is the percentage behind the planned achievement of milestones

currentNormalizedScore.description: the KPI score normalized, its format is a number between 0 and 100

budgetValue.description: the total budget as per program ceiling

totalBudget.description: the total budget as per program ceiling

inline_response_200_5_budgetSummary.description: the summary of the budget (total vs utilized) for the Initiative

id.description: the unique ID for the output

endDate.description: the planned completion date for the output

outputStatus.description: the completion status of the output

numOfOutputs.description: the total number of outputs related to the Initiative

numOfCompletedOutputs.description: the total number of completed outputs related to the Initiative

numOfIncompleteOutputs.description: the total number of incomplete outputs related to the Initiative

inline_response_200_5_outputs.description: the list of outputs related to the Initiative

id.description: the unique ID for the milestone

endDate.description: the planned completion date for the milestone

progressPercentage.description: the cumulative completion percentage for the milestone
